name: Frigid Defense
description:
This was a short game made solely by me in the span of a month using free Unity assets for turret models and fx. It's technically going to be in development for a few more weeks but a major goal of mine for this project was to shake off the rust and constrain myself to a month of development and polish. (Plus I'm really looking forward to starting up development on  a new text based adventure game idea!)  

Regardless, Frigid Defense has a win state and a final level. Enjoy!
